name: Female Invest
headline: Female Invest is a social e-learning app for finance and investing
description:
Female Invest is on a mission to close the financial gender gap. By creating a safe space and a trusted source for knowledge, we’re democratising investing for everyone globally. 

We’ve supported more than half a million women across 100 countries with our services. This makes us the world's largest univers combining financial learning and community. 

Currently, we make $5.2 million in ARR from approx. 43.000 paying users. 92% of our users are on a yearly plan, and average churn is 2.4% in the last 3 months. Our unit economics are best in class and consistently improving .

We’ve raised approximately $12 million in seed funding from prominent investors across the EU and US and are soon ready to raise our Series A, where we are aiming to close an additional $10-15 million. The company operates within FinTech, EdTech and Investing. 

In 2022, Female Invest did its first acquisition by acquiring the Danish investing platform, GAIA Technologies A/S. 

The company’s headquarter is located in Copenhagen and has a smaller office in London.

Download our app to get the full experience.

founders.name: Anna-Sophie Hartvigsen, Founder
founders.description: I am a Co-Founder of Female Invest, Europe's leading financial educator targeting women.

founders.name: Emma Bitz, Founder
founders.description: I am a co-Founder of Female Invest - a social e-learning platform for investing.

founders.name: Camilla Falkenberg, Founder

#### Your questions answered
01
What does a membership include?
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/624380709031623bfe4aee60/624380709031621ef64aee78_icon_plus.svg)
Female Invest is a universe for financial learning and a community consisting of thousands of women. Our learning materials cover a wide range of content within investing, personal finance and financial wellbeing.‍‍**What is included?**
A membership at Female Invest gives you access to:‍
  * Financial learning platform, consisting of in-depth courses, articles, and learning videos about investing, personal finance and financial wellbeing.
  * Weekly webinars with experts on a wide range of topics and our weekly market updates. Available both live and on-demand.
  * A broad selection of practical worksheets to help you get an overview of your finances, savings, and investment portfolio.
  * A trading simulator to practice investment strategies in a risk-free environment.
  * Online Community where you can ask our experts questions and meet and share knowledge with empowered and likeminded women.
  * Live Q&As where you can ask questions directly to our experts at Female Invest.
  * Invitations to our physical events and other member benefits such as discounts on selected events and so much more.


Our learning materials are **relevant for women worldwide,** offering universal principles and strategies applicable wherever you are.
02
Is the membership for me?
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/624380709031623bfe4aee60/624380709031621ef64aee78_icon_plus.svg)
Yes. Female Invest welcomes anyone and everyone from all walks of life to transform their financial futures. Whether you’re new to investing or an expert, we definitely have something for you.**Can anyone join, regardless of gender?‍** Yes, of course! Female Invest is not a women-only community. While we focus on empowering women because research shows they tend to fall financially behind men, we welcome individuals of all genders who share our mission of financial equality.
03
How much does a membership cost?
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/624380709031623bfe4aee60/624380709031621ef64aee78_icon_plus.svg)
At Female Invest, we offer two types of membership:‍1. **A monthly membership** which costs $13.00 per month2. **A annual membership** which costs $139.00 per yearPlease note that all our memberships will be renewed automatically, if not cancelled before the renewal date. You can cancel your membership at any time and you will still have full access to our content until the expiration date. You are able to read more about our Terms of Service [here.](https://www.femaleinvest.com/</terms-of-service>)_‍_
04
Should I choose the Danish, British or Global membership?
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/624380709031623bfe4aee60/624380709031621ef64aee78_icon_plus.svg)
We use your selected region to tailor your user experience and support different currencies, languages and regions and provide more localised content. You can always change your content region in your profile settings._‍_ 🇩🇰 If you choose the Danish membership, you will have access to all our Danish content and automatically be assigned to DK-specific groups in our community. This membership is relevant when you are a Danish citizen, as it is specified to Danish trading platforms, SKAT, Danish pension law etc.🇬🇧 If you choose the British membership, you will have access to all content in English and automatically be assigned to UK-specific groups in our community. This membership contains specific content for UK citizens such as ISAs, UK trading platforms, and UK pension and tax laws.🌎 If you choose the Global membership, you’ll have access to all content in English and automatically be assigned to Global-specific groups in our community. This membership contains more general content around investing, personal finance and financial wellbeing and is suitable for those who live in neither Denmark nor the UK.If you are still unsure which membership you should choose, please contact us at support@femaleinvest.com.
05
What is the cancellation policy?
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/624380709031623bfe4aee60/624380709031621ef64aee78_icon_plus.svg)
You can cancel your Female Invest membership at any time. The cancellation takes effect at the end of the current membership period.Please note that we do not offer refunds, when you cancel your membership in the middle of a period, as you will still have full access to our platform until the cancellation takes effect upon your next payment.
**Right of withdrawal** Female Invest is a digital service where you have full access to our content immediately after your purchase. Since you can use our entire platform directly after you have completed your purchase, you hereby consent to waive your right of withdrawal upon creation of the membership. You are able to read more about our Terms of Service [here.](https://www.femaleinvest.com/</terms-of-service>)**30-Day Money Back Guarantee** However, we also understand the importance of satisfaction and confidence in our services. That's why we offer a 30-Day Money Back Guarantee for all new members.‍**Eligibility:** This guarantee applies to your first billing cycle only.**Duration:** It's valid from the date and time your membership starts and extends for 30 days.‍**How to Request a Refund** If you purchased your membership directly through the Female Invest website, you can request a refund by contacting our customer service.

#### Your questions answered
01
What does a membership include?
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/624380709031623bfe4aee60/624380709031621ef64aee78_icon_plus.svg)
Female Invest is a universe for financial learning and a community consisting of thousands of women. Our learning materials cover a wide range of content within investing, personal finance and financial wellbeing.‍‍**What is included?**
A membership at Female Invest gives you access to:‍
  * Financial learning platform, consisting of in-depth courses, articles, and learning videos about investing, personal finance and financial wellbeing.
  * Weekly webinars with experts on a wide range of topics and our weekly market updates. Available both live and on-demand.
  * A broad selection of practical worksheets to help you get an overview of your finances, savings, and investment portfolio.
  * A trading simulator to practice investment strategies in a risk-free environment.
  * Online Community where you can ask our experts questions and meet and share knowledge with empowered and likeminded women.
  * Live Q&As where you can ask questions directly to our experts at Female Invest.
  * Invitations to our physical events and other member benefits such as discounts on selected events and so much more.


Our learning materials are **relevant for women worldwide,** offering universal principles and strategies applicable wherever you are.
02
Is the membership for me?
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/624380709031623bfe4aee60/624380709031621ef64aee78_icon_plus.svg)
Yes. Female Invest welcomes anyone and everyone from all walks of life to transform their financial futures. Whether you’re new to investing or an expert, we definitely have something for you.**Can anyone join, regardless of gender?‍** Yes, of course! Female Invest is not a women-only community. While we focus on empowering women because research shows they tend to fall financially behind men, we welcome individuals of all genders who share our mission of financial equality.
03
How much does a membership cost?
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/624380709031623bfe4aee60/624380709031621ef64aee78_icon_plus.svg)
At Female Invest, we offer two types of membership:‍1. **A monthly membership** which costs $13.00 per month2. **A annual membership** which costs $139.00 per yearPlease note that all our memberships will be renewed automatically, if not cancelled before the renewal date. You can cancel your membership at any time and you will still have full access to our content until the expiration date. You are able to read more about our Terms of Service here.⟨57⟩_‍_
04
Should I choose the Danish, British or Global membership?
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/624380709031623bfe4aee60/624380709031621ef64aee78_icon_plus.svg)
We use your selected region to tailor your user experience and support different currencies, languages and regions and provide more localised content. You can always change your content region in your profile settings._‍_ 🇩🇰 If you choose the Danish membership, you will have access to all our Danish content and automatically be assigned to DK-specific groups in our community. This membership is relevant when you are a Danish citizen, as it is specified to Danish trading platforms, SKAT, Danish pension law etc.🇬🇧 If you choose the British membership, you will have access to all content in English and automatically be assigned to UK-specific groups in our community. This membership contains specific content for UK citizens such as ISAs, UK trading platforms, and UK pension and tax laws.🌎 If you choose the Global membership, you’ll have access to all content in English and automatically be assigned to Global-specific groups in our community. This membership contains more general content around investing, personal finance and financial wellbeing and is suitable for those who live in neither Denmark nor the UK.If you are still unsure which membership you should choose, please contact us at support@femaleinvest.com.
05
What is the cancellation policy?
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/624380709031623bfe4aee60/624380709031621ef64aee78_icon_plus.svg)
You can cancel your Female Invest membership at any time. The cancellation takes effect at the end of the current membership period.Please note that we do not offer refunds, when you cancel your membership in the middle of a period, as you will still have full access to our platform until the cancellation takes effect upon your next payment.
**Right of withdrawal** Female Invest is a digital service where you have full access to our content immediately after your purchase. Since you can use our entire platform directly after you have completed your purchase, you hereby consent to waive your right of withdrawal upon creation of the membership. You are able to read more about our Terms of Service here.⟨57⟩**30-Day Money Back Guarantee** However, we also understand the importance of satisfaction and confidence in our services. That's why we offer a 30-Day Money Back Guarantee for all new members.‍**Eligibility:** This guarantee applies to your first billing cycle only.**Duration:** It's valid from the date and time your membership starts and extends for 30 days.‍**How to Request a Refund** If you purchased your membership directly through the Female Invest website, you can request a refund by contacting our customer service.

generated_description:
**Company Summary: Female Invest**

Founded in 2019 and hailing from Copenhagen, Female Invest is on a mission to close the financial gender gap through a unique social e-learning app that empowers women across the globe with financial knowledge and investing skills. They’ve already impacted over 500,000 women in 100+ countries, positioning themselves as the largest global community-focused financial learning platform specifically designed for women.

**Business Model and Growth Metrics**

As of now, Female Invest boasts an impressive annual recurring revenue (ARR) of $5.2 million from approximately 43,000 paying users. Notably, 92% of these users are subscribed to annual plans, demonstrating a strong value perception and loyalty—evidenced by a low average churn rate of just 2.4% over the past three months. Their unit economics are touted as best-in-class, continuously improving as they scale.

Having successfully raised around $12 million in seed funding from esteemed investors in both the EU and the US, they are gearing up to close an additional $10-15 million in Series A funding. This financial injection will aid their ongoing expansion into the intersection of FinTech, EdTech, and investing.

In a significant strategic move, Female Invest made its first acquisition in 2022 by purchasing the Danish investing platform GAIA Technologies A/S, further expanding its offerings and market reach.

**Team and Headquarters**

The company has a dedicated team of 35 employees led by co-founders who foster an inclusive and educational atmosphere aimed specifically at female empowerment within the financial realm. 

**What They Offer**

Their app is a comprehensive platform that combines financial learning and community engagement. Members gain access to a rich pool of resources, including in-depth courses, articles, and weekly expert webinars covering topics from personal finance to sustainable investing. They emphasize a welcoming environment for anyone curious about finance—regardless of gender—reflecting a shared commitment to increasing financial literacy across demographics.

**Conclusion**

In a world where financial literacy is key to empowerment, Female Invest stands out not just for its mission, but for its proven ability to engage and support women in their financial journeys. The combination of an engaged global community, sound business metrics, and strategic growth plans positions them well as a leader in democratizing finance for women worldwide. 

For more details and to join the mission, check out their website: [Female Invest](https://www.femaleinvest.com/).
